When you’re out with the boys playing basketball or hitting the gym, you know your B.O. will reek after all that sweat. Sometimes, deodorants aren’t enough to get the job done, and there are rarely any fragrances that are strong enough to mask the smell. Only a fellow athlete will truly understand the kind of perfume it takes to always smell good and feel great throughout the day, and that is where the best CR7 colognes come into play. This brand is all about passion and the winning mindset, created by one of the best soccer players in the world — Cristiano Ronaldo. Yet not all of the variants are top quality; in reality, only a handful can make that claim. I looked for the best CR7 colognes available online, fit for your active lifestyle and intimate moments. It’s followed by the affordable Play It Cool variant, which comes in a convenient spray bottle on top of being a casual and cool fragrance. The aroma stays on your skin for about four to six hours, and it’s one of the few fragrances available that you can wear year-round. The citrus notes make it ideal for summer and spring while the woodsy and vanilla hints make it great for fall and winter. It comes in a convenient spray bottle and features an invigorating citrus opening made from Mandarin orange, pear, and bergamot. It then eases into the calming essence of sea notes, lavender, and cardamom. Once the heart of this CR7 cologne settles in, you’ll notice the spicy base of tonka bean, amberwood, and musk. The Play It Cool also has outstanding longevity. A few sprays can last an entire day, making it a great perfume to mask your odor after a sweaty workout. Who is this for? Perfect for men who are looking for affordable blue colognes. Flaws but not deal-breakers: There’s a strong alcohol smell at the opening. Its refreshing fusion of gourmand notes eases into the heart of clary sage, geranium, and salty lavender. The musky base of vetiver and patchouli balances it all out, producing a pleasant and invigorating scent profile that keeps you cool and energized. This CR7 cologne is versatile enough for day and night wear and can last all day, even if you spray only on the pulse points. It’s packed in a stylish cyan square bottle with a remarkable number 7 silhouette, teasing the iconic athlete behind the premium fragrance. Who is this for? An excellent cologne for men who love water sports. Flaws but not deal-breakers: It’s quite expensive for a sports perfume. Top Notes: Pineapple sorbet, Mandarin, Bay leaf | Middle Notes: Clary sage, Geranium, Salty lavender | Base Notes: Patchouli, Vetiver | Type: Eau de Toilette Best on Amazon: Cristiano Ronaldo CR7 Fearless For Men Why it’s great: If you want to exude strength, determination, and confidence, then try the CR7 Fearless cologne. It fuses the masculine allure of wood and spice with the softness of floral notes, featuring a unique scent that represents the refined yet commanding presence of confident men. It’s a warm fragrance that’s best suited for autumn, but you can wear it on cool spring days, too. The opening comes off a bit fruity with a hint of marine accords. It will gradually change into a darker benzoin-like smell, and the dry down becomes musky and leathery with a hint of flowers and spices. Who is this for? Young guys looking for charming perfumes to impress the ladies will enjoy this CR7 coologne. Flaws but not deal-breakers: It doesn’t last as long as the other CR7s. Specifically designed as a casual evening fragrance, it features strong woody notes combined with the sweetness of fruit. Its addicting blend opens up with the crisp notes of Apple, papaya, and cardamom. The heart treats you to the pleasant odor of elemi, violet, lavender, and juniper berries. The dry down of cashmere woods, cedarwood, sugared tonka, and guaiac wood keeps it grounded and not too overpowering. It’s tightly packed in a travel-friendly bottle, ensuring that you can easily reapply when you need to. Who is this for? Club-goers will get a knack out of this dark, sophisticated CR7 cologne. Flaws but not deal-breakers: It’s not suitable for hot weather. It includes a 1.7 oz bottle of the original CR7, along with a 5.1 oz shower gel. This two-piece fragrance combo lets you experience its sporty and energizing scent profile. The gel allows you to elevate your shower experience by locking in the cocktail of bold, daring aromas into your routine, enveloping you in olfactory bliss. It’s a great sampler kit for anyone who wants to try the CR7 collection for the first time. Who is this for? The perfect gift for any Cristiano Ronaldo fan or anyone looking to try a  CR7 cologne. Flaws but not deal-breakers: Trying both the shower gel and the fragrance on the same day might be too overwhelming. It’s best to grab options that have a longevity of more than four hours. For smell, you can go for choices that can keep you cool and refreshed so you can play or work out more. Spicy and musky ones tend to lean more on casual social gatherings. Season Consider the season you want to use them in when buying perfumes. Not all of them are built with versatility in mind. A good rule of thumb is to get floral or woodsy notes for spring and fall. Those with marine and citrus accords are best for summer, and spicy and warm blends are best worn in winter. Style The impression that you want to give also plays a determining factor in choosing a CR7 cologne. The original variant is for sports junkies who don’t want to reek of body odor. Some have below-average performance, and you can’t have something like that on this list. To accurately judge the products, I chose the best CR7 colognes based on the following factors: Purpose: Are you looking for long-lasting perfumes or an option to keep you fresh and cool throughout the day? I selected bottles that can cater to specific needs. Customer Reviews: User feedback is a great indicator of a product’s quality. Their first-hand experience gives potential buyers a window into the cologne’s performance. Price: You shouldn’t recklessly go for the most expensive CR7 cologne when the budget-friendly alternative already works for you. I made sure that there’s a harmonious balance between quality and price when writing this list. Why Trust Us? Joe Niehaus is an experienced lifestyle blogger, fashion writer, and product reviewer. His strong background comes from years of experience writing for notable websites such as The Adult Man and Travel+Leisure. His research method includes analyzing the products’ features and judging their notes and performance. He also considers customer reviews as part of the judging process, providing readers with valuable information based on expert knowledge and real-life testimonials. In turn, buyers can effectively make informed decisions that allow them to maximize the benefits of their purchases. Final Verdict  The best CR7 colognes should embody the athlete’s go-getter attitude, outstanding confidence, and unparalleled determination. The Cristiano Ronaldo Eau de Toilette showcases that spirit through its floral, musky, and sweet notes. Its remarkable projection, long-lasting aroma, and more than 3,000 positive Amazon reviews prove that nothing can truly beat the original. FAQ CR7 colognes smell a bit sporty with a hint of floral and spicy accords. Depending on the variant, you might also get hints of tropical and marine notes. To get the best olfactory experience, spray the CR7 around six to eight times. Some options have high concentrations, so just lessen the number to four to five on the pulse points. The original Cristiano Ronaldo Eau de Toilette lasts for about four to six hours when applied. Others tend to fade more quickly, like the Fearless variant. When you’re out with the boys playing basketball or hitting the gym, you know your B.O. will reek after all that sweat. Sometimes, deodorants aren’t enough to get the job done, and there are rarely any fragrances that are strong enough to mask the smell.

Only a fellow athlete will truly understand the kind of perfume it takes to always smell good and feel great throughout the day, and that is where the best CR7 colognes come into play.

This brand is all about passion and the winning mindset, created by one of the best soccer players in the world — Cristiano Ronaldo.

Yet not all of the variants are top quality; in reality, only a handful can make that claim. I looked for the best CR7 colognes available online, fit for your active lifestyle and intimate moments.

Read more to find the one you’re searching for.

Key Takeaways

Unraveling the best CR7 colognes requires meticulous attention to detail and the ability to judge them based on their features. I chose the best six based on their scent, longevity, style, and season they’re appropriate for. The original CR7 takes the top spot because of its woody and uplifting aroma. It’s followed by the affordable Play It Cool variant, which comes in a convenient spray bottle on top of being a casual and cool fragrance.


In This Article

  1. Our Picks
  2. Buying Considerations
  3. How We Chose
  4. Why Trust Us?
  5. Final Verdict
  6. FAQs

Best Overall: Cristiano Ronaldo CR7 Eau de Toilette

Why it’s great: The original CR7 starts with a warm, sweet, and powdery scent with a hint of spiciness. During the dry down, you’ll immediately notice the floral, musky, and sweet accords. It also has moderate longevity and sillage. The aroma stays on your skin for about four to six hours, and it’s one of the few fragrances available that you can wear year-round.

The citrus notes make it ideal for summer and spring while the woodsy and vanilla hints make it great for fall and winter. This CR7 cologne also comes in a sleek red bottle with Cristiano Ronaldo’s silhouette on top of the bottle cap, perfect for fans of both the athlete and the sport.

Who is this for? Great for guys looking for a classic and sporty cologne.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: Some people find the opening too synthetic.

Top Notes: Artemisia, Bergamot, Cardamom, Lavender | Middle Notes: Tobacco, Cinnamon, Iris, Cedarwood | Base Notes: Vanilla bean, Musk, Sandalwood, Amber | Type: Eau de Toilette

Best Budget: Cristiano Ronaldo CR7 Play It Cool

Why it’s great: If you’re looking for a blue fragrance that won’t put a dent in your wallet, then try the CR7 Play It Cool. It comes in a convenient spray bottle and features an invigorating citrus opening made from Mandarin orange, pear, and bergamot. It then eases into the calming essence of sea notes, lavender, and cardamom.

Once the heart of this CR7 cologne settles in, you’ll notice the spicy base of tonka bean, amberwood, and musk. The Play It Cool also has outstanding longevity. A few sprays can last an entire day, making it a great perfume to mask your odor after a sweaty workout.

Who is this for? Perfect for men who are looking for affordable blue colognes.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: There’s a strong alcohol smell at the opening.

Top Notes: Mandarin orange, Pear, Bergamot | Middle Notes: Sea notes, Lavender, Cardamom | Base Notes: Tonka bean, Amberwood, Musk | Type: Eau de Toilette

Best Luxury: Cristiano Ronaldo CR7 Origins

Why it’s great: The CR7 Origins comes as a luxuriously fresh tropical medley that captures the essence of breathtaking ocean breezes and island florals. Its refreshing fusion of gourmand notes eases into the heart of clary sage, geranium, and salty lavender. The musky base of vetiver and patchouli balances it all out, producing a pleasant and invigorating scent profile that keeps you cool and energized.

This CR7 cologne is versatile enough for day and night wear and can last all day, even if you spray only on the pulse points. It’s packed in a stylish cyan square bottle with a remarkable number 7 silhouette, teasing the iconic athlete behind the premium fragrance.

Who is this for? An excellent cologne for men who love water sports.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: It’s quite expensive for a sports perfume.

Top Notes: Pineapple sorbet, Mandarin, Bay leaf | Middle Notes: Clary sage, Geranium, Salty lavender | Base Notes: Patchouli, Vetiver | Type: Eau de Toilette

Best on Amazon: Cristiano Ronaldo CR7 Fearless For Men

Why it’s great: If you want to exude strength, determination, and confidence, then try the CR7 Fearless cologne. It fuses the masculine allure of wood and spice with the softness of floral notes, featuring a unique scent that represents the refined yet commanding presence of confident men.

It’s a warm fragrance that’s best suited for autumn, but you can wear it on cool spring days, too. The opening comes off a bit fruity with a hint of marine accords. It will gradually change into a darker benzoin-like smell, and the dry down becomes musky and leathery with a hint of flowers and spices.

Who is this for? Young guys looking for charming perfumes to impress the ladies will enjoy this CR7 coologne.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: It doesn’t last as long as the other CR7s.

Top Notes: Red apple, Longoza, Bay leaf, Grapefruit, Violet leaf | Middle Notes: Nutmeg, Geranium, Violet | Base Notes: Amrostar®, Cashmeran, Vanilla, Labdanum, Tonka | Type: Eau de Toilette

Best Everyday: Cristiano Ronaldo CR7 Game On

Why it’s great: If you love to party the night away and do so every day of the week, then try the CR7 Game On. Specifically designed as a casual evening fragrance, it features strong woody notes combined with the sweetness of fruit. Its addicting blend opens up with the crisp notes of Apple, papaya, and cardamom.

The heart treats you to the pleasant odor of elemi, violet, lavender, and juniper berries. The dry down of cashmere woods, cedarwood, sugared tonka, and guaiac wood keeps it grounded and not too overpowering. It’s tightly packed in a travel-friendly bottle, ensuring that you can easily reapply when you need to.

Who is this for? Club-goers will get a knack out of this dark, sophisticated CR7 cologne.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: It’s not suitable for hot weather.

Top Notes: Crisp apple, Papaya, Cardamom, Crushed ice | Middle Notes: Elemi, Violet, Dew, Lavender bud, Juniper berry | Base Notes: Cashmere woods, Cedarwood, Sugared tonka, Bean Guaiacwood | Type: Eau de Toilette

Best Gift: Cristiano Ronaldo CR7 Gift Set

Why it’s great: Introduce your friends and family to the captivating scents of the CR7 with this gift set. It includes a 1.7 oz bottle of the original CR7, along with a 5.1 oz shower gel. This two-piece fragrance combo lets you experience its sporty and energizing scent profile.

The gel allows you to elevate your shower experience by locking in the cocktail of bold, daring aromas into your routine, enveloping you in olfactory bliss. It’s a great sampler kit for anyone who wants to try the CR7 collection for the first time.

Who is this for? The perfect gift for any Cristiano Ronaldo fan or anyone looking to try a  CR7 cologne.

Flaws but not deal-breakers: Trying both the shower gel and the fragrance on the same day might be too overwhelming.

Top Notes: Artemisia, Bergamot, Cardamom, Lavender | Middle Notes: Tobacco, Cinnamon, Iris, Cedarwood | Base Notes: Vanilla bean, Musk, Sandalwood, Amber | Type: Eau de Toilette

Buying Considerations For the Best CR7 Colognes

Smell & Longevity

If you’re actively into sports or hitting the gym, then your colognes need to last long on top of featuring pleasant scent profiles. It’s best to grab options that have a longevity of more than four hours. For smell, you can go for choices that can keep you cool and refreshed so you can play or work out more.
